scripts.hub: cd Hub && poetry run uvicorn main:app --reload --port=8000
scripts.parser: cd Parser && poetry run uvicorn main:app --reload --port=8001
scripts.worker1: cd Worker && poetry run uvicorn main:app --reload --port=8002
scripts.worker2: cd Worker && poetry run uvicorn main:app --reload --port=8003
scripts.protoc: npm run protoc_hub && npm run protoc_parser && npm run protoc_worker
